name: .GLINK File Extension
summary: Learn about .GLINK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Google Drive, Google Drive for Desktop, and ChromeOS users can double-click a GLINK file to open the webpage or file the GLINK file points to.
If necessary, you can also open a GLINK file in any text editor, to view the URL of the webpage or file your GLINK file links to.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
